name: multi-actor-ecommerce
description: Multi-Actor E-Commerce app for (user,seller,admin) , handling authentication and authorization , user can view products and add to cart and pay and deliver the order , for seller he can add product , update ,delete , view his products ,view orders and update order status, admin can manage everything on the website
author: mohamed fahim

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js'
